TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A protein made by the body that causes certain nerve cells to grow and helps keep them alive.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "nerve growth factor"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "factor de crecimiento nervioso"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Proteína elaborada por el cuerpo que hace que ciertas células nerviosas crezcan y las ayuda a mantenerse vivas.
